name: You're Not Alone (repardeimaj)
description:
Navigate your way to reach the door to the next room. It may seem impossible at first but remember you're not alone

Goal: move your character(red) to the door at the other end of the room. But be careful of the spikes, you only have one life. You have an unlimited amount of friends to help you through the level. You can use as many and kill as many as you need

Controls: 

arrow keys: move main character, jump = up

w,a,d keys: move helper character, jump= w

+ button in top right corner: add new helper

< > button in top right corner: switch between helpers
